price: No soul knows what delights are kept hidden for them as a reward for what they used to do.
arabic: فَلَا تَعۡلَمُ نَفۡسٞ مَّآ أُخۡفِيَ لَهُم مِّن قُرَّةِ أَعۡيُنٖ جَزَآءَۢ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
